description: Launch Automation for CentOS Linux instance

commands:
sudo su -
yum update -y
curl -O https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py
python get-pip.py
pip install awscli
sudo yum install sssd realmd oddjob oddjob-mkhomedir adcli krb5-workstation openldap-clients policycoreutils-python -y
echo Packages are installed

sudo su -
domain=$(aws ssm get-parameters --names /domain/name --region ap-south-1 --query 'Parameters[0].Value' --output text)
if realm list |grep $domain; then echo "Host has already joined $domain so exiting"; exit -1; fi;
instanceId=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)
hostname=$(aws ec2 describe-instances --instance-id $instanceId --region ap-south-1 --query 'Reservations[0].Instances[0].Tags[?Key==`hostname`].Value' --output text)
if [ -z "$hostname" ]; then echo "hostname (case sensitive) tag is not defined so exiting"; exit -1; fi
echo $hostname.$domain > /etc/hostname
echo 127.0.0.1 $hostname.$domain $hostname > /etc/hosts
echo "Hostname has changed and rebooting now"
reboot

sudo su -
domain=`realm list|head -1`
cp /etc/sssd/sssd.conf /etc/sssd/sssd.conf.backup
echo dyndns_update = true >> /etc/sssd/sssd.conf
echo dyndns_refresh_interval = 43200 >> /etc/sssd/sssd.conf
echo dyndns_update_ptr = true >> /etc/sssd/sssd.conf
echo dyndns_ttl = 3600 >> /etc/sssd/sssd.conf
echo Updated sssd.conf, now restarting sssd service
/bin/systemctl restart sssd.service
cp /etc/ssh/sshd_config  /etc/ssh/sshd_config.backup
sed -i -e 's/PasswordAuthentication no/PasswordAuthentication yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
echo Updated sshd_config, now restarting sshd service
/bin/systemctl restart sshd.service
echo "${sudoers}@$domain ALL=(ALL) ALL" >> /etc/sudoers.d/${sudoers}
